name: @zufans/alpaca
description: @zufan/alpaca Alpaca Trading API provides a comprehensive set of endpoints for managing Stocks and Crypto trading activities, account information, market real-time, and more. It is designed for developers looking to create automated trading systems or integrate Alpaca's functionalities into their applications.

scripts.npm:publish: npm run build:types && npm publish --access public

author: Kidus T
